name: Upnpscanner
body: Upnp Scanner ======= UPnP Scanner can discover any UPnP devices present in the local network. Features * Discover all UPnP devices in the network * Discover DIAL devices including Chromecast and Fire TV * Filter device by device type * Automatic update when devices are added/removed from the network * Device details for selected devices ** The application is based on the Cling - Java/Android UPnP library http://4thline.org/projects/cling/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
